original_text: Then Agrippa said to Paul, ‘Can you change what I believe in this short time? Should I become a Christian already? Is that what you think?’
korean_text: 아그립바가 바울에게 이르되 네가 적은 말로 나를 권하여 그리스도인이 되게 하려 하는도다

sentences.original_text: Can you change what I believe
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 나의 믿음을 바꿀 수 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Should I become a Christian already?
